TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Mali, title = Mali, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mali} }

S.FORM: Mali Itini i 17 00 N, 4 00 W, noAfilika ko Mali. Polong no sekalay i 1,240,192 sq km "saka 24 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 1,220,190 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 20,002 sq km " Polong i 17,467,108 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 34.10%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 10.20%, malo no roma to a sera 55.70%. siyoto O (((Bamako)) ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakasiwa 22 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Ibrahim Boubacar Keïta , patirengan a romi'ad i 2013 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 4 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部

Mali Itini i 17 00 N, 4 00 W, noAfilika ko Mali. Polong no sekalay i 1,240,192 sq km "saka 24 ko rayray no ngangan. " "O sekalay no sera i, 1,220,190 sq km, no nanom a sekalay i, 20,002 sq km " Polong i 17,467,108 ko tamdaw. sera Masakilac ko sera o malo kakaomahen a sera 34.10%, Malo no kilakilangan a sera 10.20%, malo no roma to a sera 55.70%. siyoto O (((Bamako)) ko Siyoto. katomirengan no kitakit a romi'ad Pihiratengan no kitakit a romi'ad i sakasiwa 22 a romi'ad. O Sawara'an no kitakit anini i ci Ibrahim Boobacar Keïta , patirengan a romi'ad i 2013 a miheca saka 9 folad saka 4 a romi'ad. Pi'arawan to lakaw CIA 外交部
